content:
Projects - Spring 2003

Vehicular Communications A project on measuring and testing communication between cars and between cars and the infrastructure.

VOIP on iPAQs A project that turns an iPAQ into an IP enabled phone.

Mobile IP A project that requires the installation and testing of two different Mobile IP platforms.

Ad Hoc Routing A project that requires the implementation of a multihop ad hoc routing algorithm.
